snippet: LEAD: For the eighth time, Patricia Krenwinkel, a member of Charles Manson's ''family,'' has been denied parole for her conviction in the murders of the actress Sharon Tate and six other people. In denying parole on Wednesday, a panel of the Board...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: For the eighth time, Patricia Krenwinkel, a member of Charles Manson's ''family,'' has been denied parole for her conviction in the murders of the actress Sharon Tate and six other people. In denying parole on Wednesday, a panel of the Board of Prison Terms cited the brutality of the 1969 murders.
